typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{GL-Code} as string,
		{GL-Desc} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Cash-Flow-Code} as string,
		{Parent-GL-Code} as string,
		Level as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		{GL-Code},
		{GL-Desc},
		Category,
		{Cash-Flow-Code},
		{Parent-GL-Code},
		Level
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code = {GL-Code},
		GL_Desc = {GL-Desc},
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = {Cash-Flow-Code},
		GL_Parent_Code = {Parent-GL-Code},
		GL_Level_Code = Level
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
